isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - IC BUS SERVICE MANUAL - OPERATION - WINDSHIELD WIPER/WASHER SYSTEM

svcsubproc.title: Windshield Wipers
svcsubproc.para: A single control switch ( Figure 12) operates the windshield wipers. Some buses are equipped with a dual (optional) or separate wiper switches. Wiper systems having dual switches are operated independent of each other. The same switch controls delay wiper controls (optional). Rotate the switch to the preferred time delay.

svcsubproc.title: Windshield Washer
svcsubproc.para: The washer switch is located within the wiper control switch. To activate the washer, push the wiper switch in momentarily and release. The wiper blades are "wet arm" type. The washer fluid will wet the windshield while the wiper arms are moving. The washer has an adjustment on the wiper arm.

svcsubproc.title: Windshield Washer Container
svcsubproc.para: The windshield washer container is located on the right frame rail of the chassis ( Figure 13). To fill the washer container, open the chassis hood, remove the washer container cap and fill.
